title: Rev
description: Rev is a speech technology company dedicated to making your conversations more productive and meaningful. Our blend of AI speed and human accuracy ensures fast and reliable results that not only captures every word you record but also analyzes and synthesize them. With 18B+ words transcribed from 6.5M+ hours of speech data, our ASR model is the most accurate and least biased in the industry. That’s why 1M+ users and 125K+ companies worldwide rely on Rev's Speech-to-Text platform and solutions.
